#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define fre 	freopen("0.in","r",stdin);freopen("0.out","w",stdout)
#define abs(x) ((x)>0?(x):-(x))
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LL signed long long int
#define scan(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define print(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define scanll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define printll(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define rep(i,from,to) for(int i=(from);i <= (to); ++i)
#define pii pair<int,int>

vector<int> G[2*100000+5];
int fdp[5002][5002];
int dp[5002][5002];
int H[5002];
int rec(int from,int boundary){
	if(from==boundary)
		return 0;
	if(fdp[from][boundary])
		return dp[from][boundary];
	fdp[from][boundary] = 1;
	int &ret = dp[from][boundary];
	if(from<boundary){
		ret = rec(from, boundary-1);
		if(H[boundary] < H[from]){
			// i can jump from 'from' to 'boundary'
			ret = max(ret, 1 + rec(boundary,from+1));//now I can jump from 'boundary' to any block in [from+1,boundary]
		}
	}
	else{
		ret = rec(from, boundary+1);
		if(H[boundary] < H[from]){
			// i can jump from 'from' to 'boundary'
			ret = max(ret, 1 + rec(boundary,from-1));//now I can jump from 'boundary' to any block in [boundary,from-1]
		}
	}
	return ret;
}
int main(){
	//fre;
	int N;
	cin>>N;
	rep(i,1,N)scan(H[i]);
	rep(i,1,N)printf("%d ",max(rec(i,1),rec(i,N)));
}
